Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 1979, 8Â°, xi-156 pp.

1. The Greeks in Egypt: Isis Adopted and Interpretated. - 2. Progressing Assimilation: Isis and the Greek Idea of Civilization. - 3. Isis in Greek Thought and Roman Feeling. - 4. A Problematic Convert.

C.R. par Michael N. Nagler, CP 78 (1983) pp. 81-83. - S. Donadoni, Athenaeum, N.S., 59 (1981) pp. 518-519. - N. Genaille, RHR 101 (1982) t. 199, pp. 100-102. - J.G. Griffiths, CR N.S., 32 (1982) pp. 53-55. - Tran Tam Tinh, Phoenix 36 (1982) pp. 195-196.
